title: MongoDB vs MySQL
description: MySQL is living in the past. MongoDB is user friendly and is better for a visual learner. Learning MySQL Joins can be very complicated when using large sets of data.

title: Coding Bootcamps
description: Only take a programming bootcamp if you have some previous knowledge. It is also very hard to keep up with the assignments while working full-time. I highly recommend not working at all or only working part-time.

title: Front-end vs Back-end Dev
description: Front-end development is more fun than the back-end because you have the ability to play around with colors. I recommend learning both so that you have a deeper understanding.
